name: Frantic Farmer
description:
The fast paced, addictive farming game about paying off your mortgage. The only way to make mortgages fun!

HOW TO PLAY (trust me, you'll need these instructions):

  • WASD to move
  • Click on things to interact with them, however you must be close to them for it to work.
  • The market in the bottom left is where you can buy seeds. The crop shown next to the number is the type of crop the seeds will grow.
  • You can plant these seeds in any of the 6 starting farming spots you have by clicking on them when you're nearby.
  • Once the seeds are grown, you can harvest the crops by clicking on them.
  • You can return these crops to the market in the bottom left for more money. Different crops sell for more or less money in certain seasons (EXAMPLE: Beach Balls sell better in summer and worse in winter, Cake sells best in fall because that's when my birthday is :), and Hot Cocoa sells best in winter)
  • If you have 1000 dollars extra, you can purchased locked crop spots to plant more seeds

WHAT ARE ALL THE NUMBERS?!

  • The red number is your mortgage. You must pay this off by the end of the 120 seconds to get a good. Every 5 seconds, if you have 1000 dollars, your mortgage and money will both be reduced by 1000. Otherwise, your mortgage will gain 500.
  • Score is calculated by subtracting the mortgage you have left to pay off from your money. If mortgage is higher than money, your score will be 0.
  • The number at the bottom is how many seconds are left in the game. The starting timer is 120. Seasons change every 15 seconds, meaning you start with 2 full years.
